Is My Church or Pastor My Covering? Pt. I
Did you know that a Pastor alone *cannot* be your covering?
💬 A Godly *community* is your real covering—not just one person. One leader can’t support every part of your walk with Christ, but a healthy community can.
🙌 Your Pastor might not even know your full name but your community does.
✨ When the Holy Spirit needs to speak you about the deep things of your life, He usually goes through people who are close to you (community), not just the leader.
📖 Covering = Community, Support, Accountability, Encouragement, all wrapped in love by those who walk with you, in community, not just by those in the spotlight, or leadership role.
❌ You lose when you go to a church just to be a member, thinking that Jesus only wants you to be a member of a church.
😊 God really wants you to be apart of a community, not just present at their gatherings.
Not forsaking the gathering of the assembly, as some are in the habit of doing, but encouraging one another—and all the more as you see the Day approaching.
Did you notice that the scriptures say, 'Not forsaking the gathering of the assembly'? It emphasizes on 'assembly' and not 'church attendance'.
💭 But what if the church you attend doesn’t offer that kind of community? 🤔 Let’s talk about that in the next episode...
